alert.note: Alert for City of Charlottesville; Culpeper; Greene; Madison; Orange (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 28 at 4:29PM EDT until May 01 at 8:37AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of central Virginia, northern Virginia and northwest Virginia, including the following counties: in central Virginia, Albemarle, City of Charlottesville, Greene and Orange. In northern Virginia, Culpeper. In northwest Virginia, Madison. * WHEN...Until 530 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 426 PM EDT, local officials reported ongoing flooding across the warned area, mainly along small streams. Between 2 and 4.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Charlottesville... Orange... Madison... Crozet... Stanardsville... Free Union... Campbell... Westmoreland... Hollymead... Gordonsville... Ruckersville... Brightwood... Ivy... Quinque... Advance Mills... Amicus... Newtown... Burtonville... Earlysville... Eheart... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. In hilly terrain there are low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.

area.areaDesc: City of Charlottesville; Culpeper; Greene; Madison; Orange
